heap.name: Heap
heap.description: Basically just a cleared out space for dumping stuff. Took a lot of pondering this one.
heap.unlockMessage: Let's push all the Wooden Logs and Raw Food into a big pile in the middle of the settlement - at least it's easy to find!

writing.name: Writing
writing.description: Passing on knowledge by word-of-mouth is getting too much, we should write this stuff down.
writing.unlockMessage: The Archives will be soon be full of lessons and teaching written down for future generations to learn from.

meal_prep.name: Meal Preparation
meal_prep.description: Turn some of these leaves and berries into more appetising and filling meals.
meal_prep.unlockMessage: We should assign Lamia to Cook the Raw Food we've harvested into Simple Rations and store them in a cool and dry Pantry. This is a much better source of food.

woodshed.name: Woodshed
woodshed.description: A permanent place to store large amounts of Wooden Logs
woodshed.unlockMessage: Woodsheds are covered buildings for storing a lot of Wooden Logs, our future aspirations require a lot of resources.
